kanto_starter_pokemons.name: bulbasaur
kanto_starter_pokemons.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth.The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.

kanto_starter_pokemons.name: ivysaur
kanto_starter_pokemons.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

kanto_starter_pokemons.name: venusaur
kanto_starter_pokemons.description: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

kanto_starter_pokemons.name: charmander
kanto_starter_pokemons.description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

kanto_starter_pokemons.name: charmeleon
kanto_starter_pokemons.description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

kanto_starter_pokemons.name: charizard
kanto_starter_pokemons.description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

kanto_starter_pokemons.name: squirtle
kanto_starter_pokemons.description: Shoots water at prey while in the water. Withdraws into its shell when in danger.

kanto_starter_pokemons.name: wartortle
kanto_starter_pokemons.description: When tapped, this POKéMON will pull in its head, but its tail will still stick out a little bit.

kanto_starter_pokemons.name: blastoise
kanto_starter_pokemons.description: It deliberately makes itself heavy so it can with­ stand the recoi nof the water jets it fires.
